name: Ahmed Ali
text: SAD. I CALL to witness the admonishing Qur'an.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But the unbelievers are still full of pride and hostility.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: How many generations have We destroyed before them who cried (for mercy) when it was too late for escape.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They were surprised that one of them had come to them as warner; and the unbelievers said: "He is a deceiving sorcerer.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Has he turned so many gods into one deity? This is indeed a strange thing!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And their leading chiefs said: "Remain attached to your gods. There is surely some motive behind it.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We never heard of it in the former faith. It is surely a fabrication.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To him of all of us has the Reminder been sent down?" They are still in doubt about My admonition; but they have not tasted My punishment yet!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do they have the stores of the mercy of your Lord, the mighty and munificent?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Or is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, theirs? Then let them climb up the ladders (to the heavens).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will be one more army vanquished among the many routed hordes.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Even before them the people of Noah, 'Ad, the mighty Pharoah,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And the Thamud, the people of Lot, as well as the dwellers of the Wood, had denied. These were the hordes.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Of all these there was not one who did not deny the messengers. So My retribution was justified.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They await but a single blast which will not be repeated.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Still they say: "O Lord, give us our share before the Day of Reckoning."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Bear with patience what they say, and remember Our votary David, man of strength. He surely turned to Us in penitence.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We subjugated the chiefs (of tribes) to struggle day and night with him,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And the levied Tair. They were all obedient to him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We further strengthened his kingdom, and bestowed wisdom on him, and judgement in legal matters.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have you heard of the litigants who jumped over the wall into his chamber?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When they came before David, he was frightened of them. "Do not be afraid," they said. "The two of us are disputing the wrong one has done the other. So judge between us with equity, and do not be unjust, and guide us to the right path.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This man here is my brother. He has ninety and nine ewes while I have only one. He demands that I should give him my ewe, and wants to get the better of me in argument."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (David) said: "He is unjust in demanding your ewe to add to his (many) ewes. Many partners are surely -- unjust to one another, except those who believe and do the right; but there are only a few of them." It occurred to David that he was being tried by Us, and he begged his Lord to forgive him, and fell down in homage and repented.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So We forgave him. He has surely a high rank with Us and an excellent place of return.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "O David, We have made you trustee on the earth. So judge between men equitably, and do not follow your lust lest it should lead you astray from the way of God. Surely for those who go astray from the way of God, is severe punishment, for having forgotten the Day of Reckoning.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, all for nothing. Only those who deny imagine so. So for the unbelievers there is woe from the fire.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Should We equate those who do the right with those who spread corruption in the land? Should We make those who are morally integrated equal to those who seek disintegration?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have sent down a Book to you which is blessed, so that people may apply their minds to its revelations, and the men of wisdom may reflect.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We bestowed Solomon on David who was an excellent devotee, for he turned to God in penitence.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When they brought fleet-footed chargers in the evening to show him,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "The love of horses is worthy of desire to me for the remembrance of my Lord;" and when they were out of sight, (he said):

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Bring them back to me," and he began to rub and stroke their shanks and necks.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We surely tried Solomon, and placed another body on his throne. So he turned to God

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Saying: "O Lord, forgive me, and give me such a dominion as none will merit after me. You are the great bestower."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So we subjugated the wind to his service which carried his merchandise wheresoever he wished;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And the devils -- the builders and divers of all kinds,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And many others bound in bond.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "This is Our gift," (We said to him), "so bestow freely or withhold without reckoning."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He has a high position with Us and an excellent abode.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Remember Our votary Job because he called to his Lord: "Satan has afflicted me with disease and distress."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Go swiftly to the spring," (We said). "This cold water is for bathing and for drinking."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We restored his family to him with others similar to them, as a blessing from Us and a reminder for men of wisdom. --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: "Take a handful of herbs," (We said to him), and apply and rub them, and do not make a mistake." We found him patient in adversity, an excellent devotee, always turning in repentance.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Remember Our votaries Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, men of power and insight.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We distinguished them for the distinct remembrance of the abode (of the Hereafter).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They are the chosen ones, the excellent in Our sight.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhu'l-Kifl. Every one of them is among the best.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is a commemoration. Surely for those who take heed for themselves is an excellent place of return --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Gardens of Eden with gates open wide to them,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Where they will take their ease, calling for fruits in plenty, and for wine,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: With companions of modest look, the same in age, by their side.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is what is promised you for the Day of Reckoning.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is surely Our provision never-ending.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This (for the virtuous); but for the transgressors the evil destination,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Hell, in which they will burn. How vile a resting place!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There will be boiling water for them and cold, clammy, fetid drink to taste,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And other similar torments.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Here is a multitude rushing headlong with you. There is no welcome for them. They will roast in the fire.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will say: "In fact, it is you who will have no welcome. It is you who brought this upon us. What an evil place of rest!"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will say: "O Lord, give him who has brought this upon us two times more the torment of Hell;"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And will add: "O what has happened to us that we do not see the men we counted among the wicked.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Did we laugh at them (for nothing), or our eyes fail to pick them out?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This contending of the inmates of Hell will surely be real.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "I am only a warner, and there is no other god but God, the one, the omnipotent,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, all-mighty, all-forgiving."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "This is a momentous message,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: To which you pay no heed.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I had no knowledge of the higher Assembly when they discussed it among themselves.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Only this has been revealed to me that I am a distinct warner.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When your Lord said to the angels: "I am going to create a man from clay;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And when I have made him and have breathed into him of My spirit. Fall down in homage before him."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then the angels bowed before him in a body,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Except Iblis. He was filled with pride and turned an unbeliever.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Said (God): "O Iblis, what hindered you from adoring what I created by My own authority? Are you too proud, or too high and mighty?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "I am better than he. You created me from fire, and him from clay."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (God) said: "Then go hence, ostracised.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "O Lord, give me respite till the day the dead rise from their graves."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (God) said: "You have the respite

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Till the appointed day."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: He said: "By Your authority, I will lead them astray,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Other than the chosen ones among Your creatures."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (God) said: "This is right by Me, and what I say is right.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: I will fill up Hell with you together with those who follow you."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "I do not ask any compensation of you for it, nor am I a specious pretender.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is only a warning for mankind.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You will come to know its truth in time."
